name: Merrely Forest
description:
This game was created during Secter Santa Jam in 2020.

Github: https://github.com/Klirik/santa-jam

Used Assets:

*Trees https://opengameart.org/content/zrpg-tiles

*Pers: https://opengameart.org/content/fumiko-complete-charset

*Tiles https://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-grassland-tileset
